thread.title: Actress Elizabeth Ramsey passes away at 83
thread.title_full: Actress Elizabeth Ramsey passes away at 83

author: rmaricuelo
title: Actress Elizabeth Ramsey passes away at 83
text:
Actress Elizabeth Ramsey passes away at 83 SHARES: 12:03 PM October 8th, 2015 Recommended October 8th, 2015 12:03 PM SCREENGRAB from Jaya’s Facebook page 
Actress Elizabeth Ramsey passed away on Thursday morning, her daughter Jaya confirmed. She was 83. 
A statement was issued by Jaya on her Facebook account, saying her “Mama Beth is now with the Lord.” 
“Thank you for your love and prayers and I rejoice because she passes in her sleep. In peace. In God’s loving arms. Bye mama, until we meet again. I love you forever. Thank you Jesus,” her post read. ADVERTISEMENT 
She said her mother has given laughter not only to their family but to the whole nation as well. NC/RAM
